createforminstance: Special page name for [[Special:CreateFormInstance]] special page
formeditor: Special page name for [[Special:FormEditor]] special page
forms-api-get-definitions-no-name: Error message when no name was given for "name" parameter in the "forms-get-definitions" api module
forms-api-get-definitions-not-exist: Error message when the definition to the given name in the "name" parameter does not exist in the "forms-get-definitions" api module
forms-target-json-page-summary:
Default summary on page save when no summary was given on a form edit.
*$1 - Name of the form, that was used to edit the page
forms-error-no-form-specified: Error message, when no form is specified
forms-edit-error-form-sealed: Error message shown when user attempts to edit a sealed form instance
forms-api-form-submit-invalid-target: Error message when the "target" proviced is invalid in the "forms-form-submit" api module
forms-error-form-mismatch: Error message when the save failed due to a form name mismatch
forms-error-target-db-save-failed: Generic error message when saving to database failed

forms-form-meta-tag:
Meta text on pages left by editing with a form.
*$1 - Name of the Form. Should be linked
*$2 - Revision id of the form, that was used to edit the page
forms-form-editor-button-import-template: Label for button that allowes importing form fields from a template in form editor
forms-form-editor-confirm-import-templat: Confirmation message, that tells the user, that this action will delete all current fields in the form and replace them with ones imported from the selected template. The User should be asked if the user wants to proceed!
forms-action-editsource:
Label for content action link.
{{Identical/Edit source}}
forms-form-editor-prop-rl-deps: Label for the form editor field that specifies the list of RL module dependencies (module names)
forms-form-editor-prop-rl-deps-help: Help text for the form editor field that specifies the list of RL module dependencies (module names)
forms-form-editor-prop-targettypeemail:
Label for target type "email" select option in the form editor.
{{Identical|Email}}
forms-form-editor-prop-target-email-rece: Label for dropdown widget which allows selection of receiver of mail
forms-form-editor-prop-target-email-subj: Label for text input widget to define email subject
forms-form-editor-prop-target-email-body: Label for text input to define content of email
forms-error-target-mail-send-failed: Label for error message if mail send failed
forms-error-target-mail-no-mail: Label for error message if no valid mail address is set
